sourceMeaningMnemonic: You <radical>request</radical> that <radical>winter</radical> <kanji>rescue</kanji> you from the warmth of the other seasons.
meaningInfo: It's so hot. You hate it. You really hope winter will get your request and come early to rescue you.
readingMnemonic: You get a note in the mail from winter! This is it, you're going to be rescued! You open the note and it says, "I have <kanji>rescue</kanji>d you with this <reading>cu</reading>cumber (<ja>きゅう</ja>)." A cucumber falls out of the note.
readingInfo: This cucumber is supposed to be cool and refreshing enough to rescue you from the heat. I guess it was too much to expect winter to come early just for you. At least cucumbers are yummy.
